short.ar: قم بتحويل وضغط وتحرير ملفات الفيديو والصوت والصور عبر الإنترنت بأكثر من 1000 صيغة.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Convert, compress, edit video, audio, image files online in over 1000 formats.
short.de: Konvertieren, Komprimieren und Bearbeiten von Videos, Audios, Bilddateien online zu 1000+ Formate.
short.es: Convertir, comprimir, editar video, audio, imagen archivos online en más de 1000 formatos.
short.fr: Convertir, compresser, éditer des fichiers vidéo, audio et image en ligne en plus de 1000 formats.
short.id: Konversikan berkas secara daring dari satu format ke format lain. Mendukung lebih dari 2.500 macam konversi.
short.it: Converti, comprimi, modifica video, audio, file di immagini online in oltre 1000 formati.
short.ja: オンラインで1000以上のフォーマットの動画、オーディオ、画像ファイルを変換、圧縮、編集します。
short.nl: Converteer, comprimeer, bewerk video-, audio- en afbeeldingsbestanden online in meer dan 1000 formaten.
short.pl: Konwertuj pliki z jednego formatu w inny. Wsparcie dla ponad 2500 różnych konwersji.
short.pt_BR: Converta ficheiros online de um formato para outro. Mais de 2500 diferentes conversões suportadas.
short.pt_PT: Converta, comprima, edite arquivos de vídeo, áudio e imagem on-line em mais de 1000 formatos.
short.ru: Конвертируйте, сжимайте, редактируйте видео, аудио, графические файлы онлайн в более чем 1000 форматах..
short.th: แปลงไฟล์ออนไลน์จากฟอร์แมตหนึ่งเป็นฟอร์แมตอื่น ๆ. รองรับการแปลงไฟล์มากกว่า 2500 รูปแบบ
short.tr: Dosyaların biçimini bir diğerine çevrimiçi olarak dönüştürün. 2500'den fazla dönüşüm destekli.
short.vi: Chuyển đổi tập tin trực tuyến từ định dạng này sang định dạng khác. Hỗ trợ hơn 2.500 chuyển đổi khác nhau.
short.zh_CN: 支持超过1000种格式,在线转换、压缩、编辑视频,音频,图像文件。

long.ar,de,es,fr,id,it,ja,ko,nl,pl,pt_BR,pt_P:
Video Compressor

Online UniConverter allows you to compress video, reduce video file size online for free without losing quality. The compressed files can be saved to Dropbox or downloaded directly. 

How to compress video?
Step 1. Click the Video Compressor extension icon and select Video Compressor. It will open an online video compressor tool.
Step 2. Drag and drop or click the + icon to import video files you want to compress.
Step 3. Choose an output format like MP4 from the Convert all files to > Video tab.
Step 4. Hit the CONVERT button to start the video compression process.
Step 5. Click the DOWNLOAD or Save to Dropbox button to get the compressed files.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
Online Free Video Compressor

Online UniConverter allows you to compress video, reduce video file size online for free without losing quality. The compressed files can be saved to Dropbox or downloaded directly. 

How to compress video?
Step 1. Click the Video Compressor extension icon on the top right corner of your Chrome browser. It will open an online free video compressor.
Step 2. Drag and drop or click the Choose Files button to import video files you want to compress.
Step 3. Choose an output format like MP4 from the Convert all files to > Video tab.
Step 4. Hit the CONVERT button to start the video compression process.
Step 5. Click the DOWNLOAD or Save to Dropbox button to get the compressed files.
